org.openrdf.rio.nquads

Class NQuadsParserTestCase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openrdf.rio.nquads.NQuadsParserTestCase

  • public abstract class NQuadsParserTestCase
extends Object
    JUnit test for the N-Quads parser.
    Author:
    Peter Ansell
